text: 2058 (MMLVIII) will be . ==Predicted and scheduled events== * January 1 – Books, movies, and other works published in 1962 will enter the public domain in the United States. * May 31 - 100th anniversary of the Pizza Hut. * The 2058 Winter Olympics will be held. ** December 31 – After this date, works published between January 1, 1978 and December 31, 2002 have the possibility of entering the public domain in the United States. U.S. Copyright law specifically prohibits any work created during that period from automatically entering the public domain before this date. Category:2058
